grant_type.description: This describes the type of authentication.

client_id.description: The client_id that is provided to you.

client_secret.description: The client_secret that is provided to you.

code-samples.code:
<?php

$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.instamojo.com/oauth2/token/');     
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, FALSE);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, TRUE);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, TRUE);

$payload = Array(
    'grant_type' => 'client_credentials',
    'client_id' => '21fe14a60057ece6c76496175cb0238a2ffd87be',
    'client_secret' => '-KWPoDO!_l?MZQ-DsZeQ0TXXcvuDn;mxmAtGho8Xijn=iH6F'
  );

curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($payload));
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch); 

echo $response;

?>

curl https://api.instamojo.com/oauth2/token/ \
  --data 
"grant_type=client_credentials&client_id=21fe14a60057ece6c76496175cb0238a2ffd87be&client_secret=-KWPoDO!_l?MZQ-DsZeQ0TXXcvuDn;mxmAtGho8Xijn=iH6F"

post.description: This will refund a payment made on Instamojo. You need to use a token that is obtained using the Application Based Authentication.

type.description: A three letter short-code identifying the reason for this case.

refund_amount.description: This field can be used to specify the refund amount. For instance, you may want to issue a refund for an amount lesser than what was paid. Default is paid amount.

transaction_id.description: Mandatory parameter in the body from the second case creation onwards for the payment to prevent duplicate case creations due to replay of APIs

body.example: Customer isn't satisfied with the quality

code-samples.code:
<?php

$ch = curl_init();

curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.instamojo.com/v2/payments/MOJO5c04000J30502939/refund/');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, FALSE);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, TRUE);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, TRUE);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER,array('Authorization: Bearer y70kak2K0Rg7J4PAL8sdW0MutnGJEl'));

$payload = Array(
    'transaction_id' => 'partial_refund_1',
    'type' => 'TNR',
    'body' => 'Need to refund to the buyer.',
    'refund_amount' => '100'
);

curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($payload));
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch); 

?>

post.description: This will create a payment request on Instamojo. You need to use a token that is obtained using the Application Based Authentication.

amount.description: The amount for the request. The minimum amount is 9. And the maximum is 200000.

redirect_url.description: URL where we redirect the user after a payment. If provided, we will redirect the user to `redirect_url` immediately after the payment has been processed. Three additional query arguments `payment_request_id`, `payment_status` and `payment_id` are also sent with the redirect URL.

webhook.description: URL where our server do POST request after a payment  If provided, we will do a the POST request to the webhook (url) with full details of the payment

allow_repeated_payments.description: If `allow_repeated_payments` is `false`, only one payment can be paid on a payment request link. `allow_repeated_payments` is `true` by default.

send_email.description: Flag to send request link via email.  If `send_email` is `true`, a request email will be sent to the email supplied. If `send_email` is `true` but no email is supplied, request creation will throw an error.

expires_at.description: Time after which the payment request will be expired in UTC timestamp. Max value is 600 seconds. Default is Null

  'allow_repeated_payments': 'False',
}

  "https://api.instamojo.com/v2/payment_requests/", 
  data=payload, 
  headers=headers
)
